title: Top Places to visit in West Garo Hills, Tura, Meghalaya
content: West Garo Hills is an administrative district in Garo Hills of the state of Meghalaya in India. Tura town is the administrative headquarters of the district. The district occupies an area of 3714 km². In 2001 its population was 515,813. As of 2011 it is the second most populous district of M
